mechanics.condition: Caster chooses up to three creatures they can see within range
mechanics.outcome: Each chosen creature must make a Charisma Saving Throw

mechanics.condition: Target previously failed the initial Charisma Saving Throw AND Spell has not ended
mechanics.outcome: Target must roll 1d4 and subtract the number rolled from the Attack Roll

mechanics.condition: Target previously failed the initial Charisma Saving Throw AND Spell has not ended
mechanics.outcome: Target must roll 1d4 and subtract the number rolled from the Saving Throw

description_text: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make charisma saving throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.
